body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us today. My name is Jeremy Smith, and I'm a customer service representative at ComfyStay Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Deborah Roberts.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Deborah. How do you spell your last name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My last name is spelled R-O-B-E-R-T-S.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Additionally, could you provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is eight six seven five three zero nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Deborah. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Deborah. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out to us anytime. Have a wonderful day!
